mapper.update:
update T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CONDITION
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPERTS_TYPE_ID = #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENDER_TIME = #{tenderTime,jdbcType=DATE},
"RESPONSE TIME" = #{responseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGE = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SATISFY_CONDITION = #{satisfyCondition,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPERT_COUNT = #{expertCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXPERT_ID = #{expertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPERTS_FROM = #{expertsFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CONDITION set PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERTS_TYPE_ID = #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENDER_TIME = #{tenderTime,jdbcType=DATE}, "RESPONSE TIME" = #{responseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGE = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SATISFY_CONDITION = #{satisfyCondition,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERT_COUNT = #{expertCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXPERT_ID = #{expertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERTS_FROM = #{expertsFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT EC.*, CT."ID" AS ctid, CT.CATEGORY_NAME,CT.EXPERTS_COUNT,CT.EXPERTS_QUALIFICATION,CT.EXPERTS_TYPE_ID as cttypeid FROM T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CONDITION ec LEFT JOIN T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CON_TYPE ct ON EC."ID"=CT.CONDITION_ID
